laboratory_examinations.findings: 2 types of E. coli isolated: one extended-spectrum beta-lactamase (ESBL) producer (meropenem MIC < 1 µg/mL) and one pan-resistant organism (meropenem MIC > 8 µg/mL)
No enhancement for the second pan-resistant isolate with the ceftazidime disk
Equivocal result with a zone enhancement of 4 mm
Negative results for blaIMP and blaVIM genes; presence of aacA7 confirmed by PCR
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Retrieved E. coli isolates retested for NDM-1, consistent result with NDM-1
